name: Rat Out! (created by rated3G)
description:
"Rat Out" is a 2D 2-Player racing puzzle game which features rats with a goal of taking the cheese back to their colony for food reserves during winter.

Grab the cheese before the other player does, and bring it back to your colony.

We need your feedbacks for further development of the game. Thank you!

TRY IT OUT!!

Controls:
Hit the other rat to steal the cheese.

Using a one keyboard
Player 1:
WASD - movement

Player 2:
Arrow keys - movement

You can attach controllers if you prefer it for your movement.
